text.__SUMMARY__: The Sulawesi forest turtle (Leucocephalon yuwonoi) is a critically endangered species of turtle in the family Geoemydidae. It is monotypic within the genus Leucocephalon. It is endemic to Sulawesi in Indonesia.
text.Conservation: The Riverview Zoo in Peterborough, Ontario  has currently managed to  hatch two forest turtles as of 2016.
text.See also:
Forsten's tortoise (Indotestudo forstenii) – another threatened turtle endemic to Sulawesi, Indonesia.
